data.title: Heathrow Airport taxi to or from LHR
data.meta_description: Heathrow  airport taxi transfer service. Reliable, clean taxis to or from LHR-Amersham
data.text:
Transfer Lhr-amersham Heathrow

Heathrow Airport to Amersham Taxi Service is provided by Onward Travel Solutions Ltd. We offer a transfer service from Amersham to any U.K Airport, whether you need a car, people carrier, executive car, executive people carrier or minibus Onward Travel Solutions Ltd are here to help. If you are traveling to or from Heathrow Airport please select the type of journey required from the drop down and you will be able to extract an instant quote. If you are traveling to a different airport please click Reset and select the correct airport from the drop down. All our bookings are pre booked and pre paid for so you can rest assured we will be there to meet you or take you to your destination.

Overview of Amersham

The town of Amersham of the Chiltern Hills is 21 miles North of Heathrow Airport that takes approx 30 minutes by car via the M4 and M25. It is situated in the county of Buckinghamshire and is adjacent to the regions of Hertfordshire and Oxfordshire. It is part of the London Commuter belt due to it being a distance of around 32 miles just 50 minutes by car via the M40 and A40. The town has a population of 17,719 and the town is made up of two areas Old Amersham and Amersham on the Hill. The newest area of the town gradually grew With the establishment of the railway line in 1892. The town has a history of manufacture in brick-making, lace, tanning and beer brewing.

The old town is an interesting place for visitors going back as far as pre saxon times, its architecture represents the period of 17th and 18th Century england with its black and white half timbered buildings with one or two dating back to the 15th century which are still very well preserved. The new town differs slightly in being more modern with shopping centre, Library and Chiltern Pools. Places of interest include Amersham Museum with original Tudor building and interactive displays, Junior Indoor climbing and Chesham Heated Open-Air Pool. Take a stroll around Harvines Park with playgrounds and indoor activities for kids, or look around the shops, gallerys, pubs and coffee shops that are in the town along with its variety of Restaurants and bars.

There are a number of primary and secondary schools in the area but Amersham is widely known for its college - the Amersham and Wycombe college which is accessed by residents of other neighbouring towns for its range of courses it has to offer for students. Two of the towns pubs have been used in the filming of Four Weddings and a Funeral, and famous people that come from Amersham include Tim Rice, Bill Pertwee, Roger Moore and Zoe Ball who attended Amersham College.

Extensive Fleet

We provide access to a large fleet of vehicle sizes and types. Regardless of your party size, luggage or special requirements, we can usually provide the perfect vehicle.

If you have any queries about vehicle suitability, please check our vehicle calculator.

Saloon Car: Ford Mondeo, VW Passat or similar. These can accommodate up to 3 passengers plus 3 standard suitcases (23kg max), or 4 passengers plus hand luggage. Ford Mondeo or VW Passat or similar.

Executive Car: E Class Mercedes or similar. These can accommodate up to 3 passengers plus 3 standard suitcases (23kg max), or 4 passengers plus hand luggage. E-Class Mercedes or similar.

Estate Car: Volvo Estate, VW Passat or similar. These can accommodate up to 4 passengers plus 4 standard suitcases (23kg max). Volvo Estate, VW Passat or similar.

People Carrier: VW Sharan, Ford Galaxy or similar. These can accommodate up to 5 passengers plus 5 standard suitcases (23kg max), or 6 passengers plus hand luggage. VW Sharan, Ford Galaxy or similar.

Executive People Carrier: Mercedes Viano or similar. These can accommodate up to 5 passengers plus 5 standard suitcases (23kg max), or 6 passengers plus hand luggage. Mercedes Viano or similar.

8 Seater Minibus: VW Transporter or similar. These can accommodate 8 passengers plus up to 8 standard suitcases (23kg max). VW Transporter or similar.
